comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when swith filter operator from isNull to IN[07]

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071121-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a CUSTOMERS Dataset from sampleDB
2, Drag the dataset into layout
3, Specify a isNull filter on the table
4, Modify the filter's operator to Not In or In filter

Expected result:
After step4, no exception occurs

Actual result:
NPE Throws out

Error logs:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:84)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:947)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3744)

	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.provider.AbstractFormHandleProvider.edit(AbstractFormHandleProvider.java:46)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.widget.FormPropertyDescriptor.edit(FormPropertyDescriptor.java:429)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.widget.FormPropertyDescriptor.handleTableMouseDoubleClickEvent(FormPropertyDescriptor.java:966)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.attributes.widget.FormPropertyDescriptor$3.mouseDoubleClick(FormPropertyDescriptor.java:293)

when executing this line:
tableViewer.setInput(value1List);
it throws an exception, that's because valueList has one element, but the only element is null.


In the program, after setting value1 to null,
I find that FilterConditionHandle.getValue1() returns null, that's OK.
But FilterConditionHandle.getValue1List() returns a list whose size is 1 with null as the only element.

I think when setting value1 to null, the value1 list should be an empty list instead of a list with null as its only element.

Could model team correct this ?
When the operator is "isNull", UI should not setValue1(""), but should just setValue1((String)null).

It includes map, highlight and filter for table and crosstab.
Fixed.
